gurmukhi: khUM rMk rwj kumwr ] khUM byd ibAws Avqwr ]18]48]
transliteration: Kahoon Rank Raaj Koumaar|| Kahoon Bed Biaas Avtaar||1848||
translation: Somewhere someone is poor and someone a prince, somewhere someone is incarnation of Ved Vyas. 18.48.

gurmukhi: keI bHm byd rtMq ] keI syK nwm aucrMq ]
transliteration: Kaee Brahm Bed Ratant|| Kaee Sekh Naam Ouchrant||
translation: Some Brahmins recite Vedas, some Sheikhs repeat the Name of the Lord.

gurmukhi: bYrwg khUM sMinAws ] khUM iPrq rUp audws ]19]49]
transliteration: Bairaag Kahoon Sanniaas|| Kahoon Phirat Roop Udaas||19||49||
translation: Somewhere there is a follower of the path of Bairag (detachment) and somewhere one follows the path of Sannyas (asceticism), somewhere someone wanders as an Udasi (stoic).19.49.

gurmukhi: sB krm Pokt jwn ] sB Drm inhPl mwn ]
transliteration: Sabh Karam Phokat Jaan|| Sabh Dharam Nihphal Maan||
translation: Know all the Karmas (actions) as useless, consider all the religious paths of no value.

gurmukhi: ibn eyk nwm ADwr ] sB krm Brm ibcwr ]20]50]
transliteration: Bin Ek Naam Adhaar|| Sabh Karam Bharam Bichaar||20||50||
translation: Without the prop of the only Name of the Lord, all the Karmas be considered as illusion.20.50.
BY THY GRACE. LAGHU NIRAAJ STANZA

gurmukhi: jly hrI ] Qly hrI ] aury hrI ] bny hrI ]1]51]
transliteration: Jale Daroo|| Thale Daroo|| Ure Daroo|| Bade Daroo||1||51||
translation: The Lord is in water. The Lord is on land. The Lord is in the heart. The Lord is in the forests.1.51.

gurmukhi: igry hrI ] guPy hrI ] iCqy hrI ] nBy hrI ]2]52]
transliteration: Gire Daroo|| Gouphe Daroo|| Chhite Daroo|| Nabhe Daroo||2||52||
translation: The Lord is in he mountains. The Lord is in the cave. The Lord is in he earth. The Lord is in the sky. 2.52.

gurmukhi: eIhwN hrI ] auhwN hrI ] ijmI hrI ] jmw hrI ]3]53]
transliteration: Eehaan Daroo|| Oohaan Daroo|| Jimoonddaroo|| Jamaa Daroo||3||53||
translation: The Lord is in here. The Lord is there. The Lord is in the earth. The Lord is in the sky. 3.53.

gurmukhi: AlyK hrI ] AByK hrI ] AdoK hrI ] AdÍYK hrI ]4]54]
transliteration: Alekh Daroo|| Abhekh Daroo|| Adokh Daroo|| Advaikh Daroo||4||54||
translation: The Lord is Accountless. The Lord is guiseless. The Lord is blemishless. The Lord is sans duality.4.54.

gurmukhi: Akwl hrI ] Apwl hrI ] Acyd hrI ] AByd hhI ]5]55]
transliteration: Akaal Daroo|| Apaal Daroo|| Achhed Daroo|| Abhed Daroo||5||55||
translation: The Lord is non-temporal. The Lord cannot be reated. The Lord is Indestructible. The Lord’s secrets cannot be known. 5.55.

gurmukhi: AjMqR hrI ] AmMqR hrI ] su qyj hrI ] AqMqR hrI ]6]56]
transliteration: Ajantra Daroo|| Amanndra Daroo|| Su Tej Daroo|| Atantra Daroo||6||56||
translation: The Lord is not in mystical digrams. The Lord is not in incantations. The Lord is of bright effulgence. The Lord is not in Tantras (magical formulas). 6.56.

gurmukhi: Ajwq hrI ] Apwq hrI ] AimqR hrI ] Amwq hrI ]7]57]
transliteration: Ajaat Daroo|| Apaat Daroo|| Amitra Daroo|| Amaat Daroo||7||57||
translation: The Lord does not take birth. The Lord does not experience death. The Lord is without any friend. The Lord is without mother. 7.57.

gurmukhi: Arog hrI ] Asok hrI ] ABrm hrI ] Akrm hrI ]8]58]
transliteration: Arog Daroo|| Asok Daroo|| Abharam Daroo|| Akaram Daroo||||8||58||
translation: The Lord is without any ailment. The Lord is without grief, The Lord is Illusionless. The Lord is Actionless. 8.58.
